fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
At night, choose someone to duel. They choose one of the games listed on this role, and duel you in it. If you win, you attack the target and gain one additional level of defense.
Chess: You and the target play a 5|5 game of chess on chess.com or lichess.com.
Geoguessr: You and the target both choose a location on Google Maps and send it in. Then, based on an image of that location, both players guess the other's location, with the closest winning.
RPS-101: You and the target both choose an RPS-101 sign.
